Text.Page: Hmm. Bad, this ledger business. Not sure who to trust. Just you and Puran. He's the commander at Gloomy Outpost. Smart. He'll have a plan. Take the ledger there. Don't tell anyone else. And move fast! Too long and they'll find out we have it!

A transport ledger? One of mine? Ah!

Keep my ledgers in a strongbox here. Only other person with a key is Quartermaster Licinza. Hmm. Wonder why Licinza would do it?
